com.googlecode.lanterna.gui

Interface TextGraphics


  • public interface TextGraphics
    Author:
    Martin

      Applies theme-specific settings according to the category supplied.

      Applies theme-specific settings according to the definition supplied.

      Draws a string to the terminal, with the first character starting at specified coordinates and which an option list of styles applied.

      Replaces the content of the entire TextGraphic object with one character

      Size of the area the TextGraphics can edit, as a TerminalSize object, any attempts to draw outside of this area will be ignored.

    • Method Detail

      • applyTheme

        void applyTheme(Theme.Category category)
        Applies theme-specific settings according to the category supplied. This may modify the foreground color, background color and/or styles. Any string drawn after this call will have these settings applied
        Parameters:
        category - Category to use

      • applyTheme

        void applyTheme(Theme.Definition themeItem)
        Applies theme-specific settings according to the definition supplied. This may modify the foreground color, background color and/or styles. Any string drawn after this call will have these settings applied
        Parameters:
        themeItem - Definition to use

      • drawString

        void drawString(int column,
              int row,
              String string,
              ScreenCharacterStyle... styles)
        Draws a string to the terminal, with the first character starting at specified coordinates and which an option list of styles applied. All coordinates are local to the top-left corner of the TextGraphics object
        Parameters:
        column - Column of the first character in the string
        row - Row of the first character in the string
        string - String to print to terminal
        styles - Which styles to apply to the string

      • fillArea

        void fillArea(char character)
        Replaces the content of the entire TextGraphic object with one character
        Parameters:
        character - Character to fill the area with

      • fillRectangle

        void fillRectangle(char character,
                 TerminalPosition topLeft,
                 TerminalSize rectangleSize)
        Replaces the content of a rectangle within the TextGraphic drawing area with a specified character
        Parameters:
        character - Character to fill the area with

      • getBackgroundColor

        Terminal.Color getBackgroundColor()

      • getForegroundColor

        Terminal.Color getForegroundColor()

      • getHeight

        int getHeight()
        Height, in rows, of the TextGraphics drawing area. Attemps to draw outside of this will be ignored
        Returns:
        Size of the TextGraphics area, in rows

      • getSize

        TerminalSize getSize()
        Size of the area the TextGraphics can edit, as a TerminalSize object, any attempts to draw outside of this area will be ignored.
        Returns:
        Size of the area the TextGraphics can edit, as a TerminalSize object

      • getTheme

        Theme getTheme()

      • getWidth

        int getWidth()
        Width, in columns, of the TextGraphics drawing area. Attemps to draw outside of this will be ignored
        Returns:
        Size of the TextGraphics area, in columns

      • setBackgroundColor

        void setBackgroundColor(Terminal.Color backgroundColor)

      • setBoldMask

        void setBoldMask(boolean enabledBoldMask)

      • setForegroundColor

        void setForegroundColor(Terminal.Color foregroundColor)

      • subAreaGraphics

        TextGraphics subAreaGraphics(TerminalPosition terminalPosition)
        Creates a new TextGraphics object using the same area or smaller. Use the terminalPosition variable to determine what the new TextGraphics object will cover.
        Parameters:
        terminalPosition - In local coordinates of the current TextGraphics, the left-left coordinates of the new TextGraphics
        Returns:
        A new TextGraphics object covering the same or smaller area as this

      • subAreaGraphics

        TextGraphics subAreaGraphics(TerminalPosition topLeft,
                           TerminalSize subAreaSize)
        Creates a new TextGraphics object using the same area or smaller. Use the topLeft and subAreaSize variable to determine what the new TextGraphics object will cover.
        Parameters:
        topLeft - In local coordinates of the current TextGraphics, the left-left coordinates of the new TextGraphics
        subAreaSize - Size of the area the new TextGraphics will cover
        Returns:
        A new TextGraphics object covering the same or smaller area as this

      • translateToGlobalCoordinates

        TerminalPosition translateToGlobalCoordinates(TerminalPosition pointInArea)
        Translates local coordinates of this TextGraphics object to global
        Parameters:
        pointInArea - Point in local coordinates
        Returns:
        The point in global coordinates
